Class.name: Form.REST.Form
Class.Description: Класс работы с формами и их содержимым

XData.name: UrlMap
XData.Data:
<Routes> <Map Prefix="/field" Forward="Form.REST.Field"/> <Map Prefix="/file" Forward="Form.REST.File"/> <Map Prefix="/object" Forward="Form.REST.Object"/> <Map Prefix="/objects" Forward="Form.REST.Objects"/>
<Route Url="/info" Method="GET" Call="getFormsList"/> <Route Url="/info/all" Method="GET" Call="getFormsMetadata"/> <Route Url="/info/:form" Method="GET" Call="getFormInfo"/> </Routes>

Method.name: getFormsList
Method.Description: Get available forms list as a JSON array

Method.name: getFormsMetadata
Method.Description: Get available forms metadata as JSON object
